Review Title: A  SERENE ENVIROMENT AT VICTORIA  ISLAND
Review Text: I was a guest here on 7th September 2015. The place is so quite and serene that you will think you are at your private apartment away from all distractions. The rooms are not very spacious but of medium size and very comfortable. The staff are courteous and friendly. The restaurant serves good food.

Review Title: To be avoided - not a business-friendly place
Review Text: I have traveled to Lagos at least 50 times in the last 12 years. This time, suggested by a friend, I wanted to try this Italian-managed hotel. I just want to raise two issues which I experienced personally during my 2-day stay in November 2013: a) internet connection basically does not exist. Review Title: Very good hotel! I recommend it!
Review Text: I visited this hotel 10 days ago and have been there for one week. I was satisfied at all, especially if we consider conditions in Lagos. Service is quite good, personnel very polite, rooms always clean. The most important thing the hotel is safe.   Facilities are always available, such as very good swimming pool, billiard, ad probably massage, even I didn't have opportunity to use it all the time.  Maybe, it is more expensive than I expected for a Nigerian hotel, but it worth. I recommend it.

Further to a recent unpleasant experience at one of your members’ hotels - Manuela Residence, Victoria Island, Lagos (27.11.2008);  Having booked in for two nights and paid in advance (always a mistake), I found the room comfortable, surroundings pleasant and staff friendly; unfortunately during the night there was the incessant noise from a generator.  Upon complaining to the night staff, they assured me that they would register the complaint, but no other rooms were available. The following morning when I took this up with the Reception Staff, they were less than helpful - no alternative rooms could (would) be offered; the only offer the hotel came up with was a change of room to a DeLuxe room - however a surcharge would apply, so no mention of recompense for my lost nights’
